articles.title: Manchester City beat Inter Milan to win first Champions League - Al Jazeera English
articles.description: Manchester City win the first Champions League in their history and secure the treble by beating Inter Milan 1-0.
articles.content:
Manchester City have won the Champions League title for the first time by beating Inter Milan 1-0 in Istanbuls Ataturk Olympic Stadium, making them the second English team to complete the treble.
